title: Facebook vs. FaceMash: Zuckerberg explains the difference
text:
Facebook vs. FaceMash: Zuckerberg explains the difference 2:22am IST - 00:49 
Rep. Billy Long of Missouri questioned Facebook's CEO Mark Zuckerberg Wednesday, about the prank 'FaceMash' website that Zuckerberg created as a sophomore in college. Zuckerberg confirmed that the site was not connected to Facebook. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
